text: Yadi timiharu phaisala cahanchau bhane tyo phaisala timro samu maujudacha, ra yadi yasabata panchinachau bhane yo sahrai ramro cha, ra yadi timile pheri tyahi kama garnechau bhane hamile pani pheri tyahi kama garnechaum, ra timro jat'tha timro kunai kama lagnechaina, cahe jati nai adhika kina nahos, ra satya kuro yo cha ki allaha imanavalaharuko sathama cha
